AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:template match="/"><Root><xsl:apply-templates select="Root/Record" mode="_Root_employees_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates></Root></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/Record" mode="_Root_employees_order1"> <employees><employee><id><xsl:value-of select="Age"/></id><firstName><xsl:value-of select="Name"/></firstName><lastName><xsl:value-of select="L_Name"/></lastName><email></email><phone></phone><age></age><gender></gender><country></country><city><xsl:value-of select="City"/></city><isActive></isActive><signupDate></signupDate><lastLogin></lastLogin></employee></employees></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
